main event: A flare-like light was sighted in the west-southwest, with pieces of fire falling from the object and drifting towards the ground.
interesting points: The object appeared much brighter than several stars in the sky.
The object was described as a flare-like light that eventually faded.
Pieces of fire fell from the object and drifted towards the ground, but were distinguished before reaching the ground.
The observer indicated the object would have been covered by the size of a match held at arm's length.
